## IsomorphicEncoderFull interface

Encoder that work for both server and client.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IsomorphicEncoderFull<EncodedRequest = unknown, EncodedResponse = unknown> extends ClientEncoding<EncodedRequest, EncodedResponse>, ServerEncoding<EncodedRequest, EncodedResponse>, Partial<Pick<IsomorphicEncoder, 'decode'>> 
```
**Extends:** [ClientEncoding](./async-call-rpc.clientencoding.md)<!-- -->&lt;EncodedRequest, EncodedResponse&gt;, [ServerEncoding](./async-call-rpc.serverencoding.md)<!-- -->&lt;EncodedRequest, EncodedResponse&gt;, Partial&lt;Pick&lt;[IsomorphicEncoder](./async-call-rpc.isomorphicencoder.md)<!-- -->, 'decode'&gt;&gt;
